allow: Bash(for file in components/highlights.tsx components/itinerary.tsx components/wildlife.tsx components/ship.tsx components/cabins.tsx components/cta.tsx)
Bash(for file in highlights.tsx overview.tsx itinerary.tsx ship.tsx cabins.tsx cta.tsx wildlife.tsx journey.tsx hero.tsx)
Bash(do sed -i 's/text-4xl md:text-5xl lg:text-6xl font-bold/text-4xl md:text-5xl lg:text-6xl font-light/g' "$file")
